newsitem.title: USA: First Reserve ups Domain Energy stake.
newsitem.headline: First Reserve ups Domain Energy stake.

text.p: Domain Energy Corp said Tuesday First Reserve Corp invested $8.7 million in Domain before its initial public offering of 6 million shares, which was priced at $13.50 per share early Tuesday.

Domain said it has granted the underwriters options to buy an additional 900,000 shares to cover any over-allotments. Spokeswoman Janice Aston White said First Reserve, a Greenwich, Conn., energy investment firm held 95 percent of Domain prior to the offering, which represented 43 percent of Domain's stock.
With the additional investment, First Reserve will have a 56.1 percent interest in Domain after the public offering.
Domain Energy said in a statement it will repay $54 million of debt and invest $30 million in an acquisition with the net proceeds from the offering.
The company was established as Tenneco Ventures in 1992.
